articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by State Symphony Orchestra
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by State Symphony Orchestra
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by the State Symphony Orchestra.
					 Put on the stage were serial symphonies "Song Dedicated to the Party," piano concerto "Do Prosper, My Country," orchestras "A Bumper Harvest in the Chongsan Plain" and "A Soldier Hears Rice Ears Sway" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 Through the performance the instrumentalists enthusiastically praised the immortal revolutionary feats Kim Jong Il has performed by bringing a great heyday of prosperity to this land under his indefatigable dynamic guidance and successfully represented the steadfast faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche without fail, remaining single-mindedly loyal to him.
					
					 As the performance was over, Kim Jong Il waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience and congratulated the artistes on their successful presentation.
					
					 Noting that "Song Dedicated to the Party" which was arranged and conducted by People's Artist Jang Ryong Sik, chief conductor of the State Symphony Orchestra, is another masterpiece representing the era of Songun, he highly praised the creating staff for having created the splendid work impressively making a great epic depiction of the glorious history of the WPK and extended thanks to them.
					
					 Noting that the creating staff including the conductor created the above-said serial symphonies to suit the national emotion and sentiment by displaying high caliber and powerfully demonstrated the greatness of the elegant and exquisite Korean music by peculiar conducting skill, in particular, he called on all the creators and artistes to learn from their sincere and enthusiastic work style and attitude of making a positive contribution to the creation and depiction of the masterpiece of the era which is loved by the Korean people and conducive to the revolution.
					
					 Music should satisfactorily meet the cultural and emotional requirements of the people by representing their noble spiritual world with beautiful and rich art representation as it is humanics, he said, advancing highly important tasks which would serve as guidelines for further developing the Juche-based symphony.
					
					 Underlining the need to represent the spiritual world of the people which grows nobler with the era with beautiful and rich artistic depiction and thus satisfactorily meet their cultural and emotional needs, he expressed the expectation and belief that the creators and artistes of the State Symphony Orchestra would put the level of creation and arrangement on a higher stage, further enhance the rendition skill and thus become true creators and firm defenders of the socialist culture and art.
					
					 Among the audience were Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, vice-chairman of the Party Central Military Commission and chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Party Central Military Commission, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-premier of the Cabinet, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Kim Yang Gon, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su and Kim Phyong Hae, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Mun Kyong Dok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, and leading officials of the party and the army.

articles.title: NPCK Blasts US-S. Korea Combined Military Exercises
articles.content:
NPCK Blasts US-S. Korea Combined Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The National Peace Committee of Korea issued a statement on Sunday as regards the fact that the United States and the south Korean puppet group finally kicked off the largest-scale combined military exercises aimed at armed invasion of the DPRK in the West Sea of Korea. 
					 The madcap aggression war exercises launched by them in the sea and the sky near the extension of the Military Demarcation Line in the West Sea of Korea are putting the Korean Peninsula at a state of ultra-emergency while creating the grave situation whereby peace and security are exposed to serious threat, the statement points out, and says:
					
					 The West Sea of Korea is the most acute and sensitive area where military conflict might break out anytime due to the illegal "northern limit line" unilaterally drawn by the U.S. and the ceaseless provocation of the south Korean puppet group.
					
					 However, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group kicked off in this area the military exercises with huge aggression armed forces including nuclear powered carrier involved before the recent smoke of shelling disappeared. This is no more than an attempt to find a pretext for aggression and ignite a war at any cost.  
					
					 In October last they planned to stage the frantic anti-DPRK war games with U.S. nuclear-powered aircraft carrier George Washington again involved in the West Sea of Korea only to be checked by the unanimous protest at home and abroad. But this time they carried such scheme into practice at last under the pretext of the Yonphyong Island incident.
					
					 It is the height of folly for the U.S. and the puppet group to browbeat the DPRK with such nuclear-powered aircraft carrier.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet group of traitors will be wholly held accountable for having escalated the tension in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and wrecked the regional peace and security with their reckless war maneuvers.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Palestinian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Palestinian President 
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings on Sunday to Mahmoud Abbas, President of Palestine, on the occasion of the day of world solidarity with the Palestinian people.
					 Kim in the message reaffirmed the Korean people's firm solidarity with the Palestinian people in the just struggle to retake the legitimate national rights including the right to self-determination, the right of Palestine and the right to found an independent state with Kuds as its capital city.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Albanian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Albanian President
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Bamir Topi, President of Albania, on its national day.
					Kim in the message extended congratulations to the President and people of Albania and wished prosperity to the country.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets Albanian PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets Albanian PM
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim sent a message of greetings on Sunday to his Albanian counterpart Sali Berisha on its national day.
					The message wished the Prime Minister and the Albanians greater success in their efforts for development and prosperity of the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister of DPRK Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to his Albanian counterpart Edmond Haxhinasto.

articles.title: Merciless Counteraction against Any Provocation Warned
articles.content:
Merciless Counteraction against Any Provocation Warned
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK responded with an instant and strong physical strike to the reckless military provocation the south Korean puppet forces committed by firing dozens of shells at the territorial waters of the DPRK around Yonphyong Island in the West Sea of Korea. This was a legitimate exercise of the right to self-defence taken to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK from the provocateurs' reckless moves.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday stresses this in a signed commentary.
					
					 The recent provocation by the south Korean warmongers is part of their vicious scheme to defend the brigandish "northern limit line" by persistently letting their warships into the territorial waters of the DPRK side under the pretext of "intercepting fishing boats", the commentary points out, and says:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are now busy issuing the alert order to the entire puppet forces and examining the declaration of "posture for combined control over crisis" with the U.S. like a thief crying "Stop the thief!" This is intended to shirk off their responsibility for the serious military provocation and justify their scheme for confrontation with the DPRK and moves to ignite a war against it.
					
					 There only exists in the West Sea of Korea the extension of the military demarcation line fixed by the DPRK.
					
					 The "northern limit line" adhered to by the south Korean authorities is an illegal ghost line aimed at escalating the anti-DPRK moves and provoking a war against it.
					
					 Such moves for confrontation and war with the DPRK made by the puppet war maniacs under the pretext of "defending northern limit line" will bring nothing but shameful self-destruction to them.
					
					 The DPRK will deal a merciless military counter-attack at any provocative act of intruding into its territorial waters in the future, too.

articles.title: Japan's Attempt to Get Permanent Seat at UN Flayed
articles.content:
Japan's Attempt to Get Permanent Seat at UN Flayed
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- At a plenary meeting of the 65th UN General Assembly a delegate of Japan asserted that his country is qualified to get a permanent membership of the UNSC as it has already "apologized" for the past crimes and made "contribution" to global peace and security.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a signed commentary dismisses his assertion as rubbish of making a mockery of the world and reversing black and white.
					
					 Citing data to expose that Japan has left no stone unturned to hush up and palliate the past aggression crimes and evade the blame for them, far from regarding them as hideous ones and making apology and reparation for them, the commentary says:
					
					How can such country dare to appear in the international political arena and seek a permanent seat at the UNSC.
					
					 As far as Japan's "contribution" to global peace and security is concerned, it served only to lay a way for the advance and military operation overseas of Japan's "Self-Defense Forces" on the plea of "cooperation for UN peacekeeping operation".
					
					 Japan's bid for permanent membership of the UNSC is not intended for sound development of the world community and peace but for creating international circumstance favorable for its overseas aggression by abusing the responsible post of the UN. 
					
					 If Japan, overheated with ambition for overseas expansion, is allowed to get a permanent seat at the UNSC, this will undoubtedly endanger global peace and security and put the international community at unrest.
					
					 It is a daydream for Japan to seek a responsible post at the UN without settlement of its past.
					
					 Japan should squarely see the trend of the times and the desire of the peoples and honestly settle the past to win the trust of international community before attempting to get a permanent seat at the UN.

articles.title: Repeal of Planned Joint Military Exercises Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Repeal of Planned Joint Military Exercises Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Members of 30 odd civic and public organizations in south Korea, including the Solidarity for Progress and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, held a press conference in Seoul on November 26 to demand that the U.S. and the puppet warmongers cancel their plan for joint military maneuvers in the West Sea of Korea at once.
					 In a press release they noted that the situation of the Korean Peninsula is getting worse due to the anti-DPRK moves and the ceaseless joint military exercises on the part of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					 Recalling that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities seek to stage the war maneuvers in the West Sea of Korea with huge aggression armed forces including the nuclear powered super-large carrier George Washington while crying out for "counteraction", they branded it as a dangerous move which might spark off military conflict between the south and the north.
					
					 They expressed strong opposition to the U.S. scheme for interfering in the affairs of the Korean Peninsula and escalating the military tension.

articles.title: Czech Party Condemns US-S. Korea for Attempt to Distort Facts
articles.content:
Czech Party Condemns US-S. Korea for Attempt to Distort Facts
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Czech and Moravia of the Czech Republic issued a statement on Nov. 24 as regards the tension prevailed on the Korean Peninsula.
					 The statement noted that the party is following with deep apprehension the situation of the Korean Peninsula which is put at military confrontation.
					
					 It charged that south Korea and the United States have issued news reports contrary to the stand of the DPRK.
					
					 Those who do not wish for the stability of global and regional situation are making ill use of the facts, the statement pointed out. The party holds that all measures needed for peace and stability should be taken at once, it said.

articles.title: Three Commanders of Mt. Paektu Praised
articles.content:
Three Commanders of Mt. Paektu Praised
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk issued a bulletin on Nov. 16 on the occasions of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine.
					 The bulletin edited articles under various titles with photos of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 In an article titled "Revolutionary history of Kim Jong Suk and event" the bulletin said that she performed great feats for the Korean revolution and left the immortal traces in the modern history of Korea.
					
					 She resolutely fought against any practices contrary to the idea and line of President Kim Il Sung without the slightest mercy, it noted, adding that her image as an adroit commander and a master-hand at underground operation has been kept in the hearts of the Korean people.
					
					 In an article titled "The great mother, woman political activist and woman guerrilla" the bulletin stressed that Kim Jong Suk's greatest feat is that she brought up Kim Jong Il to be an heir to the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung and the future sun of Korea. 
					
					 In articles under such titles as "Comrade Kim Il Sung, Comrade Kim Jong Il and Comrade Kim Jong Suk, three commanders of the DPRK" and "The immortal Juche idea is the man-centered idea and independent doctrine" the bulletin praised the undying exploits performed by the three commanders of Mt. Paektu for the country and the revolution and introduced the main contents of the Juche idea.
